author: kmets
content:
Was looking at the Merge client preparation breakdown here: https://ethernodes.org/merge

Are these numbers accurate?  If so, how confident are we that we will be at 51% readiness by Sept. 6th? ðŸ˜¬

author: mariusvanderwijden
content:
This is only execution layer clients, not all execution layer clients are run by stakers. 
I'm pretty confident that we will be at > 66% merge ready nodes soon. 
Last time I checked (two days ago) we where at ~20% updated, so we should be fine

author: kmets
content: Thank you so much for the clarification!
